subject: Awards, Decorations and Honors
Horse Racing
California Chrome (Race Horse)
Triple Crown (Horse Racing)
lead_paragraph: The trainer Art Sherman, who won the Kentucky Derby and the Preakness Stakes with California Chrome, will receive the Laffit Pincay Jr. Award.
snippet: The trainer Art Sherman, who won the Kentucky Derby and the Preakness Stakes with California Chrome, will receive the Laffit Pincay Jr. Award.
